subject: Productivity
title: Calendar Apps vs Paper Planners
description: A quick win: understand Calendar Apps vs Paper Planners.

hook.text: Digital calendars sync across devices. Paper planners have no battery. Both have loyal fans.

buildup.text: Google Calendar launched in 2006 and quickly dominated scheduling. Paper seemed doomed.

discovery.text: Yet paper planner sales surged in the 2010s. Many people found handwriting improved memory.

twist.text: Studies confirm that writing by hand activates deeper cognitive processing than typing.

climax.text: The best system is the one you actually use. Format matters less than consistency.

punchline.text: The best planner is the one you open daily.

quiz.question: Why did paper planner sales surge in the 2010s?
options: Many people found handwriting improved memory
